value.name: Mother of slain Capitol Police officer urges GOP senators to back Jan. 6 commission
value.description: The mother of a Capitol Police officer who died after engaging with the mob during the Jan. 6 insurrection pleaded with Republican senators on Thursday to vote for legislation that would establish a bipartisan commission to investigate the attack on the Capitol.
